paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2_c.2701delC mutation was identified in an Afro-Colombian family affected by breast/OC, with the proband diagnosed with BC at the age of 40.
The BRCA2_c.2701delC mutation was identified in an Afro-Colombian family affected by breast/OC.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The 2 BRCA2_c.2701delC carriers shared the same haplotype, indicating a common ancestor.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation has a founder origin.
key_quotes: The BRCA2_c.2701delC mutation was identified in an Afro-Colombian family affected by breast/OC.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was extracted successfully.
